showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // {Tifa}
“Actually, it's been seven years.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // “You joined SOLDIER but quit after
the Sephiroth incident, and now
you're a mercenary…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Tifa}
“You told me a lot about what happened
after you left Nibelheim… ”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Tifa}
“…Something was wrong.
I felt there was something strange
about the things you talked about.”{PAUSE}
“All the things you didn't know that you should,
And other things
you shouldn't know that you did.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // {Tifa}
“I wanted to make sure…”{PAUSE}
“But then I heard…you were going far away…”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:254, b:254, speed:254, type:30}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“And I didn't want that…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // {Tifa}
“…I didn't know what to do.
So, I thought I needed more time.”{PAUSE}“And that's why I told you about
the AVALANCHE job. I wanted
to be with you and watch you.”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“I didn't know what to do.
I was always like that…”

{Tifa}
“Is it really you, {Cloud}?
I never thought I'd find you here!”

{Tifa}
“What happened to you?
You don't look well.”

“You joined SOLDIER but quit after
the Sephiroth incident, and now
you're a mercenary…”

{Tifa}
“You told me a lot about what happened
after you left Nibelheim… ”

{Tifa}
“…Something was wrong.
I felt there was something strange
about the things you talked about.”{PAUSE}
“All the things you didn't know that you should,
And other things
you shouldn't know that you did.”

{Tifa}
“I wanted to make sure…”{PAUSE}
“But then I heard…you were going far away…”

{Tifa}
“…I didn't know what to do.
So, I thought I needed more time.”{PAUSE}“And that's why I told you about
the AVALANCHE job. I wanted
to be with you and watch you.”
